entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pattern-captured variable has a wrong value in C# 11 #67923
  • Completion deletes preceding end of line when using hard tabs #67916
    17.7 P1
  • Unable to compile project with large amount of grpc proto messages and services #67912
  • Expression `(FunctionPointerAlias)&FunctionName` raises large amout of crashes #67911
  • IDE0051 false-positive for private copy constructor in records #67910
  • GeneratedCodeAnalysisFlagsMap is slow being segmented dictionary #67909
  • PDB Tests fail on servicing branches #67908

Closed

  • Simplifier.ReduceAsync reduces default expression removing relevant type arguments #67867
  • Type `T[]*` reports parser error #65429
    17.6
  • The compiler should include the URL in the command line output #47310
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Dev/dibarbet/17 3 servicing #67922
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Hard code segment constants for common type sizes #67921
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Implements support for generic type/method updates #67918
    Area-IDE, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Avoid stack overflow due to deep recursion on long chain of calls. #67913
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge 17.0-vs-deps into 17.2 #67920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix servicing builds #67907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 7.2.1.6856 (#67875)" #67919
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into `InlineArrays` #67915
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge main to features/CollectionLiterals #67917
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect oversimplification of 'default(T)' arguments #67893
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Filter out configure & suppress code fixers when it is not in VS LSP #67885
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Initial pass at enabling prebuilt detection #67645
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Optimize some SegmentedArrayHelper members for JIT #67558
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add additional information to an argument exception #67899
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Implement element access for inline array types #67830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Include diagnostic help URL in output #67836
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #67924
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Interceptors: handle duplicates, additional signature validation, etc. #67786
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Update code lens cache to use the syntax version #67884
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Implement ISymbol.LocationList #67881
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.0 release branch #67901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Use non-void type for `BoundAwaitOperator` in VB statement #67822
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, 17.7
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
